DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate potential phototoxicity sun care product SPF 50 Y65 110 , SPF 50 Y51 002 , SPF 15 V27 104 compare negative control ( 0.9 % sodium chloride [ NaCl ] ) single 24 h application test material follow irradiation ultraviolet A ( UVA ) ultraviolet B ( UVB ) . The secondary objective study evaluate safety sun care product SPF 50 Y65 110 , SPF 50 Y51 002 , SPF 15 V27 104 combine UVA/B irradiation monitor adverse event ( AEs ) throughout study .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject , age 18 65 year Good general health , assess medical history brief visual examination skin Fitzpatrick skin Type I IV , determine interview screen Willing able practice acceptable measure contraception study , female childbearing potential Willing follow study rule , include : sun exposure ; avoidance activity would cause excessive sweating ; use lotion , cream , oil back area Must willing change current brand personal care product soap , body wash , laundry detergent , body spray , body spritz participate study
